titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to dispense with the reading of conference reports.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S643-645)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXVIII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to dispense with the reading of a conference report before determining a question of proceeding to its consideration.
